mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTQNA VALUES ( #{pid}, PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, #{contents}, sysdate, 0, PRODUCT_SEQ.CURRVAL, 0, 0 )
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum R, P.* from (select * from productqna where pid=#{pid} order by ref desc, step asc) P ) where R between #{pager.startRow} and #{pager.lastRow}
